channel.title: Problem with dropping items in inventory
channel.description:
[font=Tahoma]Well when I try dropping any item it says
'Dropping has been disabled, use ::empty to delete your inventory instead.'
But even when i do type ::empty, Nothing happens,
Can anyone tell me how I can enable drops?
Its a DeltaScape Source btw.
Thanks.[/font]

item.title: Problem with dropping items in inventory
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Ancient Epic Ancient
item.description:
@Epic_Ancient wrote:

Backup your files first…

Read full topic
item.source: Problem with dropping items in inventory

item.title: Problem with dropping items in inventory
item.dc:creator: @iloverock iloverock
item.description:
@iloverock wrote:

i think it’s in client.java try searching for “dropping has” and when it says something like

if (playerRights == 0) {
                sM(
                        "You drop the " + getItemName(droppedItem)
                        + ", it vanishes into the ground.");
                deleteItem(droppedItem, slot, playerItemsN[slot]);
                return ;
            }

only in your case it would be “, dropping has been disabled” it would be somewhat different but thats the base of it and that should help you recognize it
try removing that totally, thats all i can suggest

Read full topic
